tweet: Starting at day one on Twitter. Lets see how long it takes me to get a following ! ! !
Not a bad following - 124 after 24 hours.  Let's see how it looks tomorrow.
A little less than 48 hours and 234 followers. Tell your friends to come and join me here - I'll follow them back  ;-)
Hey, this Twitter thing is great. Less than 72 hours into this and got 568 followers!
Still looking for more followers.  After 96 hours I am up to 880!
